user_query: I'm planning a family vacation and I want to explore the popular tourist attractions in Paris. Can you provide me with a list of supported locations in Paris? Additionally, recommend some popular courses available on Udemy and provide the course URL for each course.

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of popular tourist attractions in Paris.
Get a list of popular courses available on Udemy.
Compile the results from subtask 1 and subtask 2 into a final list.
